RelatedSentence: The first criminal charges brought against a foreign power for cyber attacks were revealed yesterday by Eric Holder , the US attorney - general , who said that the alleged hacking had been conducted to give Chinese companies an advantage over US businesses .

The first criminal charges brought against a foreign power for cyber attacks were revealed yesterday by Eric Holder , the US attorney - general , who said that the alleged hacking had been conducted to give Chinese companies an advantage over US businesses .
